attributes.action: Have Parliament vote on whether to actually implement Brexit
attributes.additional_details: Legal expert David Allen Green, as quoted by Business Insider: http://www.businessinsider.com/green-eu-referendum-not-legally-binding-brexit-2016-6
attributes.background: There is still hope for us 48% of Remain voters! The 23rd June referendum result is NOT mandatory, and the government can choose to ignore it or vote on whether to actually implement Brexit. Sign this petition and compel our mainly Euro-loving MPs to reverse this terrible mistake in a diplomatic way
